task.title: Step5. Set a Static VPN IP for PBX B
task.shortdesc: By default, the OpenVPN server assigns a dynamic IP address for the OpenVPN clients. You can set a static VPN IP address for the VPN clients.

step.cmd: Double click your VPN client certificate, check the CN of the client.
Log in the PBX A web interface, go to VPN Server Static IP , click Add.
On the configuration page, enter the VPN client's CN and assign an IP address for the client.

p.note: The IP address should in the address pool of the VPN server.
